properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; New Madrid, MO; Fulton, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 8:14PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...Missouri...

Mississippi River at New Madrid

.Runoff from recent heavy rainfall will cause moderate flooding on the
Mississippi River at New Madrid Missouri. The river is forecast to crest
at 40.0 feet Wednesday morning.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at New Madrid
* until further notice.
* At  8:00 PM Thursday the stage was 35.8 feet.
* Flood Stage is 34.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 40.0 feet by
Wednesday morning then begin falling.
* Impact...At 38.0 Feet...Heavy agricultural damage begins.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
